alert.note: Alert for Desha; Drew; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 4:41PM CDT until July 09 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Desha County in southeastern Arkansas... Northeastern Drew County in southeastern Arkansas... Southwestern Lincoln County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 440 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cane Creek State Park, or 7 miles southeast of Star City, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dumas... Star City... Gould... Mitchellville... Winchester... Omega... Cane Creek State Park... Mills... Garrett Bridge... Gourd... Florence... Enon... Tyro... Rose Hill... Reedville... Crigler... Selma... Yukon... Montongo... Relfs Bluff... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
